[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Smith things using the Smithing skill.

**Usage**

- `/smith name:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to smith. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to smith (optional). | - |

**Examples**

- `/smith name:Bronze platebody`
